        Miller: 50 years</a></h3>
</div>
<div class="card-lead">
<p>PLATTSBURGH – Gerald (Richard) and Linda (Flint) Miller of Plattsburgh, N.Y. celebrated their 50<sup>th</sup> wedding anniversary on September 29<sup>th</sup>, 2017. Linda and Richard were married at St. Peter’s church, Plattsburgh, N.Y. on September 29<sup>th</sup>, 1967.</p>

<div class="asset-content subscriber-premium" itemprop="articleBody">
<p xmlns="http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-transitional.dtd">A boil-water order is in effect for certain areas in the Town of Black Brook.</p><div class="tncms-region hidden-print" id="tncms-region-article_instory_top"></div><p xmlns="http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-transitional.dtd">The order is in effect from McCrae Street to the end of the district on Route 9, Shaw Street, Palmer Street and Palmer Street Extension.</p><div class="tncms-region hidden-print" id="tncms-region-article_instory_middle"><div class="tncms-block visible-xs" id="tncms-block-1108091">
<!-- Mobile Rectangle ATF 300x250 article -->
<div class="visible-xs visible-sm" id="mobileRectangle_atf" style="width:100%;text-align:center">
<script type="text/javascript">
AdBridg.cmd.push(function() { AdBridg.display('mobileRectangle_atf'); });
</script>
</div>
<div class="clear" style="padding-bottom:10px"></div>
</div></div>
<p xmlns="http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-transitional.dtd">The directive is to remain in effect until the Health Department has satisfactory evidence of delivery of a safe water supply.</p><p xmlns="http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-transitional.dtd">For more information, call the Clinton County Health Department at 565-4870.</p><div class="tncms-region hidden-print" id="tncms-region-article_instory_bottom"></div>
</div>

        jQuery(document).ready(function($){
            var bThrottle = false;
            var $region = $('#sticky-right-rail');

            if (
                $region.is(':empty') === false &&
                $('.main-sidebar').height() + $(window).height() < $('.main-content').height() &&
                window.innerWidth >= 992
            ) {
                var $tempRegion = $('<div id="sticky-right-rail-placeholder"></div>');
                $region.before($tempRegion);
                $region.width( $tempRegion.width() );

                $(window).on('scroll mousewheel', function(){
                    if( bThrottle === false ){
                        bThrottle = true;

                        setTimeout(function(){
                            var iFixPoint = $region.offset().top - 30;
                            var iCurPoint = $(this).scrollTop();

                            if (iCurPoint < $tempRegion.offset().top - 30) {
                                $region.css('top', null);
                                $region.removeClass('affix');
                                $region.removeClass('affix-bottom');

                            } else if (
                                __tnt.elementOnScreen('#infinite-container') ||
                                __tnt.elementOnScreen('#tncms-region-global-container-bottom') ||
                                __tnt.elementOnScreen('#main-bottom-container')
                            ) {
                                $region.removeClass('affix')
                                $region.addClass('affix-bottom');

                            } else {
                                $region.css('top', 30);
                                $region.addClass('affix');
                                $region.removeClass('affix-bottom');
                            }
                            bThrottle = false;
                        }, 25);
                    }
                });

                $(window).on('resize', function(){
                    $region.width( $tempRegion.width() );
                });
            }
        });

        News and Tribune wins 11 awards in Indiana newspaper contest</a></h3>
</div>
<div class="card-lead">

<p xmlns="http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-transitional.dtd">The Rural Membership Water Corp. has issued a precautionary boil-water advisory for customers on the south side of the system.</p>

<div class="poll-panel panel">
<div class="panel-body">
<h4 class="">
<a href="/opinion/poll-should-clark-and-floyd-county-school-districts-ditch-the/poll_8a5dc4ba-d6ce-11e7-b276-cba85abe572f.html">
        

        
        POLL: Should Clark and Floyd County school districts ditch the year-round academic calendar?</a></h4>
<div class="poll-content" id="poll-8a5dc4ba-d6ce-11e7-b276-cba85abe572f-1133989">
<div class="loading-poll hide-onload text-center"><i class="fa fa-spinner fa-2x fa-spin"></i></div>
<div class="show-onload">
<p>West Clark Community Schools has voted to move forward with a more traditional school calendar after six years of a year-round school schedule. Greater Clark is expected to do the same, and Clarksville Community and New Albany-Floyd County schools are considering making the move. A more traditional school calendar would mean students would start school the second week of August (instead of in July), have one week off for fall and spring breaks (instead of two), and dismiss for summer break before the Memorial Day holiday.</p>
<div class="hide-onload" id="poll-8a5dc4ba-d6ce-11e7-b276-cba85abe572f-1133989-your-vote-container">
<strong>You voted:</strong> <div id="poll-8a5dc4ba-d6ce-11e7-b276-cba85abe572f-1133989-your-vote"></div>
</div>
<div id="poll-8a5dc4ba-d6ce-11e7-b276-cba85abe572f-1133989-results" style="display: none;"></div>
<div id="poll-8a5dc4ba-d6ce-11e7-b276-cba85abe572f-1133989-container">
<form action="/opinion/poll-should-clark-and-floyd-county-school-districts-ditch-the/poll_8a5dc4ba-d6ce-11e7-b276-cba85abe572f.html" id="poll-8a5dc4ba-d6ce-11e7-b276-cba85abe572f-1133989-form" method="post" role="form">
<div class="radio">
<label>
<input name="answer" title="Yes. Year-round was supposed to mean remediation time for students who have fallen behind, but that hasn't happened." type="radio" value="C7C79760-6300-0001-2D3F1D00AC80111B"/> Yes. Year-round was supposed to mean remediation time for students who have fallen behind, but that hasn't happened.
                                </label>
</div>
<div class="radio">
<label>
<input name="answer" title="No. The longer fall and spring breaks are perfect, and there's just enough of a summer break." type="radio" value="C7C79760-7D20-0001-FDBAEB0015271662"/> No. The longer fall and spring breaks are perfect, and there's just enough of a summer break.
                                </label>
</div>
<div class="radio">
<label>
<input name="answer" title="I'm indifferent, so long as all local school districts are on the same academic calendar." type="radio" value="C7C79760-9040-0001-FA30ABE0D130C610"/> I'm indifferent, so long as all local school districts are on the same academic calendar.
                                </label>
</div>
<button class="btn btn-success" type="submit">Vote</button>

<div class="asset-side-sticky" id="sticky-right-rail"><div class="tncms-region hidden-print" id="tncms-region-global-side-sticky"></div><div class="tncms-region hidden-print" id="tncms-region-asset_side_sticky"></div></div><script>
        jQuery(document).ready(function($){
            var bThrottle = false;
            var $region = $('#sticky-right-rail');

            if (
                $region.is(':empty') === false &&
                $('.main-sidebar').height() + $(window).height() < $('.main-content').height() &&
                window.innerWidth >= 992
            ) {
                var $tempRegion = $('<div id="sticky-right-rail-placeholder"></div>');
                $region.before($tempRegion);
                $region.width( $tempRegion.width() );

                $(window).on('scroll mousewheel', function(){
                    if( bThrottle === false ){
                        bThrottle = true;

                        setTimeout(function(){
                            var iFixPoint = $region.offset().top - 30;
                            var iCurPoint = $(this).scrollTop();

                            if (iCurPoint < $tempRegion.offset().top - 30) {
                                $region.css('top', null);
                                $region.removeClass('affix');
                                $region.removeClass('affix-bottom');

                            } else if (
                                __tnt.elementOnScreen('#infinite-container') ||
                                __tnt.elementOnScreen('#tncms-region-global-container-bottom') ||
                                __tnt.elementOnScreen('#main-bottom-container')
                            ) {
                                $region.removeClass('affix')
                                $region.addClass('affix-bottom');

                            } else {
                                $region.css('top', 30);
                                $region.addClass('affix');
                                $region.removeClass('affix-bottom');
                            }
                            bThrottle = false;
                        }, 25);
                    }
                });

                $(window).on('resize', function(){
                    $region.width( $tempRegion.width() );
                });
            }
        });
    </script>
</div>

    Some La Plata residents asked to boil their water

    by John Garlock

    Sat, 25 Jun 2011 01:01:02 GMT — 

    City crews in La Plata were busy Friday evening repairing a water leak on Sanders Street.

    City Administrator Ray Ivy told KTVO that a 48-hour boil order is in effect immediately for the affected area.

    The 48-hour period started at 6:30 p.m. on Friday, June 24.

    This boil order area goes from East Street to Tremont Street and from Moore Street to Clark Street.

Health department investigating E. Coli outbreak at Opelika pool

Print Email
Christine Kneidinger Hull, al.com By Christine Kneidinger Hull, al.com AL.com
on June 23, 2011 at 4:40 PM, updated June 23, 2011 at 5:06 PM
comments
Photo uploaded by Maggie via Flickr.

OPELIKA, Alabama -- The Alabama Department of Public Health is advising parents of children playing in SplashPark at the Opelika Sportsplex and Aquatics Center between June 12 and June 20 to be alert for symptoms of illness after four children were sent to the hospital after swimming at the park.

ADPH officials say that if a child is experiencing nausea, vomiting, diarrhea or abdominal cramps, parents should seek medical attention for their child.

Dr. Mary McIntyre, medical officer of the Bureau of Communicable Disease, said, “Based on what we know now, four children who were in the Splash Park between June 12 and June 18 have been hospitalized at East Alabama Medical Center with gastrointestinal illness.”

On June 20, Splash Parked closed to allow the health department’s Bureau of Clinical Laboratories to conduct testing at Splash Park. The samples are currently being analyzed along with specimens from the affected children. Initial testing concludes that the common denominator of the illnesses appear originate from the Opelika pool.

So far, two of the four children hospitalized have tested positive for E. coli infection believed to originate from Splash Pool at the Opelika Sportsplex and Aquatic Center. Additional follow-up from parents of children that could possibly be contaminated are expected.

Lee County doctors have also been advised to report patients with any symptoms of  bacterial infections to the ADPH Epidemiology Department.

The health department is also working with the medical community to better define the extent and cause of these illnesses.

Health officials are working with city officials to evaluate and correct the problem.

<script type="text/javascript">
		
		//An array containing the id's of all mp3 players
		var ca_myPlayers = new Array();

		var ca_position = 0;
		
		var $codeart = jQuery.noConflict();
		$codeart(document).ready(function() {
		});
		
		//Function that checks whether or not an audio format is supported
		function supports_media(mimetype, container) {
			var elem = document.createElement(container);
			if(typeof elem.canPlayType == 'function'){
				var playable = elem.canPlayType(mimetype);
				if((playable.toLowerCase() == 'maybe')||(playable.toLowerCase() == 'probably')){
					return true;
				}
			}	
			return false;
		};
		
		function ca_stopAllAudio(except){
			$codeart('audio').each(function(){
				if(this.id!=except){
					this.pause(); // Stop playing
				}
			});
			$codeart('.playpause').removeClass('play');
			$codeart('.playpause').addClass('pause');
		}
		
		//Function that toogles play/pause functions of the audio element
		function ca_tooglePlayPause(el,sender){
			var btn = document.getElementById(sender.id);
			if(document.getElementById(el).paused){
				ca_stopAllAudio(el);
				document.getElementById(el).play();	
				btn.className = "playpause play";
			}
			else{
				document.getElementById(el).pause();
				btn.className = "playpause pause";
			}
		}
		
		//Funtion to stop the audio playing
		function ca_stop(el,id){
			document.getElementById(el).pause();
			document.getElementById(el).currentTime = 0;
			document.getElementById("playpause"+id).className = "playpause pause";
		}
		
		//timeupdate media event handler
		function ca_timeUpdate(el, sender, id){
			//update span id current_time
			var sec = sender.currentTime;
			sec = sec % 3600;
			var min = Math.floor(sec / 60);
			sec = Math.floor(sec % 60);
			if (sec.toString().length < 2) sec = "0" + sec;
			if (min.toString().length < 2) min = "0" + min;
			document.getElementById('currentTime'+id).innerHTML = min + ":" + sec + " / ";
			
			//update span id duration
			var sec2 = sender.duration;
			sec2 = sec2 % 3600;
			var min2 = Math.floor(sec2 / 60);
			sec2 = Math.floor(sec2 % 60);
			if (sec2.toString().length < 2) sec2 = "0" + sec2;
			if (min2.toString().length < 2) min2 = "0" + min2;
			document.getElementById('duration'+id).innerHTML = min2 + ":" + sec2;
			
			//update seekbar attributes: start time, end time, and current time
			var seekbar = document.getElementById(el);
			seekbar.min = sender.startTime;
			seekbar.max = sender.duration;
			seekbar.value = sender.currentTime;
			
			$codeart( "#"+el ).slider( "value", sender.currentTime);
			$codeart( "#"+el ).slider( "option", "max", sender.duration );
			
			//update buffered percent of the audio file
			var width = $codeart('#seek'+id).width();
			var parentWidth = $codeart('#seek'+id).offsetParent().width();
			var percent = 100*width/parentWidth;
			var res = (sender.buffered.end(0)/sender.duration)*percent+"%";
			$codeart("#gutter"+id).css("width", res);
		}
		
		//Toogle muted property of the audio
		function ca_toogleMuted(el,sender){
			var btn = document.getElementById(sender.id);
			if(document.getElementById(el).muted==true){
				document.getElementById(el).muted=false;
				var i=ca_myPlayers.indexOf(el);
				var classVolume = ca_volumeStates[i];
				btn.className = "muteButton "+classVolume;
			}
			else{
				document.getElementById(el).muted=true;
				btn.className = "muteButton noVolume";
			}
		}
		
		//When the audio ends make the pause button look like a play button
		function ca_audioEnded(el){
			btn = document.getElementById(el);
			btn.className = "playpause pause";
		}
		
		//loadedmetadata Media event handler to update span id=duration of the audio player
		function ca_metaLoaded(id){
			var sender = document.getElementById("audio_with_controls"+id);
			var sec = sender.duration;
			sec = sec % 3600;
			var min = Math.floor(sec / 60);
			sec = Math.floor(sec % 60);
			if (sec.toString().length < 2) sec = "0" + sec;
			if (min.toString().length < 2) min = "0" + min;
			document.getElementById('duration'+id).innerHTML = min + ":" + sec;
		}
		
		//function to create the volume bar of the audio player
		function ca_createVolumeBar(id){
			$codeart("#volume"+id).slider({
				value  : 75,
				step   : 1,
				range  : "min",
				min    : 0,
				max    : 100,
				change : function(){
					var value = $codeart("#volume"+id).slider("value");
					var player = document.getElementById("audio_with_controls"+id);
					player.volume = (value / 100);
					
					var classVolume = "";
					if(value>55){
						classVolume = "fullVolume";
					} else if(value>10 && value<=55){
						classVolume = "middleVolume";
					} else{
						classVolume = "noVolume";
					}
					var i=ca_myPlayers.indexOf("audio_with_controls"+id);
					ca_volumeStates[i] = classVolume;
					if(player.muted==true){
						player.muted=false;
					}
					document.getElementById("muteButton"+id).className = "muteButton "+classVolume;
				}
			});
		}
		
		//function to create the seek bar of the audio player
		function ca_createSeekBar(id){
			var seek = $codeart("#seek"+id).slider({
				value  : 0,
				step   : 0.00000001,
				range  : "min",
				min    : 0,
				max    : document.getElementById("audio_with_controls"+id).duration,
				slide  : function( event, ui ) {
					var player = document.getElementById("audio_with_controls"+id);
					player.currentTime = ui.value;
				}
			});
		}
		
		//Initialize the volume state of the audio player when page is loaded
		function ca_initMuteButtonClass(id){
			ca_myPlayers[ca_position] = "audio_with_controls"+id;
			if($codeart("#muteButton"+id).hasClass("fullVolume")) 
			{
				ca_volumeStates[ca_position] = "fullVolume";
			} else if($codeart("#muteButton"+id).hasClass("middleVolume")){
				ca_volumeStates[ca_position] = "middleVolume";
			} else{
				ca_volumeStates[ca_position] = "noVolume";
			}
			ca_position++;
		}
		
		//Make the audio player responsive
		function ca_responsiveAudioPlayer(id,skin,download){
			var playerH = $codeart("#controls"+id).height();
			var playerW = $codeart("#controls"+id).width();
			
			//Verticaly center playpause button
			var playpauseH = $codeart("#playpause"+id).height();
			var fplaypauseH = (playerH-playpauseH)/2;
			$codeart("#playpause"+id).css("top",fplaypauseH);
			
			//Verticaly center seekbar
			var seekH = $codeart("#seek"+id).height();
			var fseekH = (playerH-seekH)/2;
			$codeart("#seek"+id).css("top",fseekH);
			
			//Verticaly center gutter
			var gutterH = $codeart("#gutter"+id).height();
			var fgutterH = (playerH-gutterH)/2;
			$codeart("#gutter"+id).css("top",fgutterH);
			
			//Verticaly adjust timer span to be above the seekbar
			var timerH = 27;
			var ftimerH = ((playerH-timerH)/2)-(gutterH);
			$codeart("#timer"+id).css("top",ftimerH);
			//Verticaly center volumebar
			var volumeH = $codeart("#volume"+id).height();
			var fvolumeH = (playerH-volumeH)/2;
			$codeart("#volume"+id).css("top",fvolumeH);
			//Verticaly center mute button
			var muteH = $codeart("#muteButton"+id).height()+2;
			var fmuteH = (playerH-muteH)/2;
			$codeart("#muteButton"+id).css("top",fmuteH);
			var stopminiH = $codeart("#stop"+id).height();
			if(skin==="small"){
				//Available space for the seekbar & volumebar within audio player
				//The seekbar's volumebar's width attribute changes, other elements remain the same
				var available = playerW-95;
				if(download==="true"){
					available = playerW-110;
				}
				//Verticaly center stop button
				var fstopminiH = (playerH-stopminiH)/2;
				var pomMuteR = 7;
				var pomTimerR = 27;
				if(download==="true"){
					pomMuteR = 35;
					pomTimerR = 50;
				}
			} else{
				//Available space for the seekbar & volumebar within audio player
				//The seekbar's volumebar's width attribute changes, other elements remain the same
				var available = playerW-100;
				//Align stop button with playpause button
				var fstopminiH = (playpauseH+fplaypauseH-stopminiH);
				var pomMuteR = 12;
				var pomTimerR = 35;
			}
			//The seekbar and the gutter are 3/4 of the available space
			var seekW = (available*75)/100;
			$codeart("#seek"+id).css("width",seekW);
			$codeart("#gutter"+id).css("width",seekW);
			
			//The volumebar is 1/4 of the available space
			var volumeW = (available*25)/100;
			if(download==="true" && skin==="small"){
				volumeW = (available*20)/100;
				$codeart("#volume"+id).css("right","34px");	
				
			}
			$codeart("#volume"+id).css("width",volumeW);
			
			var muteR = volumeW+pomMuteR;
			$codeart("#muteButton"+id).css("right",muteR);
			var timerR = volumeW+pomTimerR;
			$codeart("#timer"+id).css("right",timerR);
			$codeart("#stop"+id).css("top",fstopminiH);
			
			if(download==="true")
				$codeart("#downloadButton"+id).css("top",fstopminiH);
		}
		
		function ca_appendDownloadButton(id,mp3){
			$codeart('#default_player_fallback'+id).after('<a id="downloadButton'+id+'" class="download-flash" href="'+mp3+'"></a>');
		}
	</script>

Nyack Water provides service to the Villages of Nyack, South Nyack and a limited portion of West Nyack. The boil water is no longer in effect and all Nyack Water customers are hereby notified that it is safe to use water for purposes of consumption.</p>
